page.introP1: Starting December  14, 2025, Metro is making changes to bus service to provide more frequent and reliable trips to get riders where they need to go, when they need to go.
page.introP2: Download a PDF summary of the latest updates in:

2.update: Travel time adjustments will be made to weekday and Saturday schedules. Reduced one trip on weekday, Saturday and Sunday in the 6pm period.
2.reason: For improved reliability better reflecting actual travel times and ridership. Savings reallocated to other improvements.

4.update: Travel time adjustments will be made to weekday, Saturday and Sunday schedules. Reduced one weekday eastbound and one westbound trip in the 6pm period.
4.reason: For improved reliability better reflecting actual travel times and ridership. Savings reallocated to other improvements.

10.update: Fairfax High School terms start time adjusted.

14.update: Travel time adjustments will be made to weekday schedules only.
14.reason: For improved reliability better reflecting actual travel times.
14.description: Cedars Sinai Medical Center - Downtown LA

20.update: Travel time adjustments will be made to weekday, Saturday and Sunday schedules.
20.reason: For improved reliability better reflecting actual travel times.

30.update: Travel time adjustments will be made to weekday and Saturday schedules. Detour via Olympic Bl made permanent between Figueroa St and Union Av.
30.reason: To accommodate LA Convention Center Long-Term Construction Project with associated 18-month detour.
30.description: Pico Rimpau Transit Center - Little Tokyo Station

33.update: Travel time adjustments will be made to Saturday and Sunday schedules.
33.reason: For improved reliability better reflecting actual travel times.

37.update: Travel time adjustments will be made to weekday schedules only.
37.reason: For improved reliability better reflecting actual travel times.

45.update: Travel time adjustments will be made to weekday, Saturday and Sunday schedules. Weekday one trip added northbound in the 8am period and northbound evening trips removed one in the 5am period and one in the 6pm period.
45.reason: For improved reliability better reflecting actual travel times and ridership. Savings reallocated to other improvements.

51.update: Travel time adjustments will be made to weekday, Saturday and Sunday schedules. Reduced two weekday trips in both directions in the 6am period and adjusted Saturday daytime frequency from 7–8 minutes to every 10 minutes.
51.reason: For improved reliability better reflecting actual travel times and ridership. Savings reallocated to other improvements.
51.description: CSU Dominguez Hills - Westlake/MacArthur Park Station

55.update: Travel time adjustments will be made to weekday, Saturday and Sunday schedules. Added one weekday trip northbound in the 8am period.
55.reason: For improved reliability better reflecting actual travel times and ridership.

60.update: Modified three southbound late night trips to end at Artesia Station instead of traveling to Downtown Long Beach following its daytime schedule.
60.reason: Change made to improve connections at Artesia Station and reflect the A Line is still in operation providing service to Downtown Long Beach.
